title: IdP Redirector Extension
name: idp-redirector
author: auth0
description: This extension implements customer specific IdP redirection features.

auth0.scopes: create:clients read:clients delete:clients create:resource_servers update:resource_servers delete:resource_servers read:resource_servers read:connections create:client_grants read:client_grants read:rules create:rules delete:rules

EXTENSION_AUDIENCE.description: The audience for the extension API

DEPLOYMENT_CLIENT_NAME.description: The name of the CI/CD client

LOGS_URL.description: A URL for sending the logs
